<a name="IRAnalysisPass"></a>
## type [IRAnalysisPass](<https://github.com/Blueprint-uServices/blueprint/blob/main/blueprint/pkg/coreplugins/analysis/analysis.go#L10-L14>)

IRAnalysisPass is a Blueprint compiler pass that operates on an ir.ApplicationNode. An analysis pass may optionally modify the ApplicationNode to add/remove/modify any of the nodes in the ApplicationNode

```go
type IRAnalysisPass interface {
    Analyze(spec wiring.WiringSpec, app *ir.ApplicationNode) (bool, error)
    Name() string
    ImplementsAnalysisPass()
}
```
